artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of three elaborate women's hats on the left; in the center a woman in a whitish gown with a fuchsia sash with a bow around her waist and a fuchsia hat with brown fabric wrapped around the base and brown plumes; on the right a woman in white gown with purple trim and a pink overgown, white gloves, and a pink hat with brown plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Trente-cinquième Cahier, 11 Décembre 1789
